transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan Shivran ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Namaste sir, aapni bol rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Sir wo buyleads consume nahi kar rahe ho aap pichle kai din se kya mamla hai?
Customer: Ji ji ji. Haan mam kya hai ki main kal free hone wala hu to kal karta hu kya hai thoda shadi mein hun main isliye.
Executive: Ab to aapko leads bhi aa rahe hain aapke product ke fir bhi aap nahi kar pa rahe ho. Fir vaise to aani hi band ho jayenge na leads vagarah.
Customer: Kya ho jayega?
Executive: Main ye bol rahi hu ki aap long time se matlab lead nahi consume kiye pichle mahine mein aapne ek hi din lead li hai bas.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kam se kam aapko hafte mein teen to leni hai minimum jisse ki aapki jo AI cap matlab technical jo hai wo issue na aaye.
Customer: Aisa?
Executive: Fir agar aapki leads hi aani matlab sir manually nahi de raha hai na koi aapko lead ki Jai Shri Mahakal toys ko apne ek lead bhej di aise nahi hai. Ye lead to apne upar hai aapki visibility bhi down hogi na agar aap active jaise ab jo higher service chala raha hai usko to hum upar dikha rahe hain kyunki uski service mehangi hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Lekin ab jo jisne aap hi ki jaisi service le rakhi hai same service usme competition hai to usme upar niche automatically system hi karta hai activity ke basis par. Jo jitna active hai ya response rate jiska jyada hai wo automatically hota hai. Baki aapki local location Betma mein aap dikhoge to usme koi fayda nahi hai dikhne ka. Kyunki agar aap aur jagah nahi dikhoge to aapko utna visit nahi milega na jitna aap expect kar rahe hoge.
Customer: Sahi baat.
Executive: At least mahine mein ek se do deal aapki convert ho aapka waha pe deliver ho maal payment aaye itna to aapne bhi soch ke liya hoga na platform.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Ab agar aapki side se aap baat nahi karoge matlab aap kahin jab aap 100 logon se baat karoge tab aapki ek ya do deal convert ho payegi sir. Ab agar aap use hi nahi karoge to fir main bhi aapki kaise help karungi na.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: In case aapka man lijiye abhi to chalo aapki services ko shuru hue matlab almost 50% time aapka ja chuka hai 50% hi bacha hai. Aapko bhi yaad hoga shayad aapne July mein payment kiya tha services mein. Aur abhi us din humne aapki category vagarah bhi video mein ek tak theek ki thi thodi bahut.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Chalo mam main abhi kar leta hu. Main do dhai baje something free ho ke.
Executive: Aap mobile mein app vagarah download nahi kiye ho kya?
Customer: Mobile mein hai na.
Executive: Mobile mein app hai. To mobile mein ab to kahin bhi aap uth ke baith ke bhi notification vagarah on nahi hai usme? Ki on hai?
Customer: Bilkul bilkul main main kar leta hu aaj lead aaj lead dekh ke sari check kar leta hu.
Executive: Hmm. Theek hai na? Ek second ruko main aapko kuch do char lead bata deti hu inform kar deti hu. Baki aap apne according karna.
Customer: Main abhi matlab main thoda abhi ja raha hu thoda urgent hai. Main aaj aap teen char kya matlab jitni bhi lead padi hai na sari check kar loonga.
Executive: To aap panch minute rukiye kyunki agar aap call cut karenge na to ek second main aapke catalog ko open karti hu. Main aapko bata nahi paungi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Abhi mat kijiyega jab aapko aaj din mein jab aap free ho tab kar lijiyega. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Jaise ki kya kehte hain plastic kids toys ye aap bana rahe hain?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai Junagadh Gujarat se ek lead aayi hui hai 500 pieces isme unko puzzle toy chahiye.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Jo puzzle jodte hain na. Hmm. 21 ka. Theek hai aur jo buyer hai wo panch saal se member hai aur iska jo kaam hai wo isse thoda sa related hai sports vagarah ke shoes vagarah bechta hai to wo apni shop mein ye wale toys bhi rakhta hoga. Ye lead matlab fake bhi nahi hogi matlab kaam ki bhi ho sakti hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai ab thoda aapke aas pass mein aaun to Gorakhpur Uttar Pradesh se aayi hui hai. Small colorful plastic promotional toys. Inki jo requirement hai wo 1000 pieces ki hai. Sir aisa bhi nahi hai ki aapko matlab 100 200 wale pieces hi aa rahi ho quantity ki aa rahi hai.
Customer: Le jaao.
Executive: Sir jab teen lead aap consume kar lo na to ek bar mujhe call karke bata dena.
Customer: Okay mam okay bilkul.
Executive: Theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not consuming buyleads regularly.

- Concerned about visibility decreasing due to inactivity.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of consuming buyleads.

- Executive provided information on available leads.

- Executive offered to help with category adjustments.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check leads after getting free.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, visibility, product category
